stimulusHtml: The church of Sainte-Foy at Conques is similar to other Romanesque pilgrimage churches in that it
choicesHtml: contains radiating chapels for the veneration of relics
rejects the use of the axial plan exemplified by the basilica
provides separate spaces allowing dignitaries to view the Mass privately
was constructed in accord with the liturgical requirements of the Council of Trent
